title: Seeking Two Lovers
description: When Missing Link, the hottest new dating app, offers Lily the opportunity to fulfill her fantasy of having two men, she finds reality can be a real bitch.Coming in summer 2022, Seeking two Lovers is the first novel in the new Missing Link series based on a poly dating app created by two men who want a woman between them and features Lily Astbury from Unholy Yearning, Sinful Natures 2. Prepare yourself for MMF deliciousness and enough heat to melt your ereader!
author: Lynn Burke
